author: USA TODAY, Sara M Moniuszko, USA TODAY
title: George Takei says he's 'chilled' by Trump's coronavirus rhetoric
description: George Takei is calling out President Donald Trump for his use of the phrase "Chinese virus" in relation to COVID-19, saying he's "chilled" by it.
content:
George Takei is calling out President Donald Trump for his use of the term "Chinese virus" to refer to the coronavirus.
Trump has doubled down on labeling the coronavirus pandemic as the "Chinese virus" as he tries to distance himself from criticism over how… [+2535 chars]
